name: Color Rush (charlires)
description:
Choose wisely in a fight with the time to choose the lightest color.

Do you have the eyes to begin the ultimate challenge?

* Tons of hours of fun!

* Share your score with an incredible image!

* Games Services integration

* Beatiful design!

* And a lot more!

Let the color battle begins!

http://colorrushgame.com

Android -  IOS
